successCriteria: A KeyboardShortcuts modal component exists with all app shortcuts grouped by area
Shortcuts are displayed with styled key cap badges matching the CommandPalette kbd style
Modal opens via Ctrl+/ keyboard shortcut and a ? button in the sidebar footer
Modal is dismissible with Escape key or clicking outside
Modal uses framer-motion animations consistent with CommandPalette
Keyboard Shortcuts action is available in the command palette
pnpm typecheck passes with no errors

phases.title: Create KeyboardShortcuts component and CSS
phases.content: Create KeyboardShortcuts.tsx and KeyboardShortcuts.css in components/ui/. The component renders a modal overlay with all keyboard shortcuts grouped into sections: General, Navigation, Terminal, and Command Palette. Each shortcut shows a description and styled key caps. Uses framer-motion AnimatePresence for enter/exit animations. Accepts isOpen and onClose props. Export from components/ui/index.ts.

phases.title: Wire up Ctrl+/ shortcut, ? button, and command palette action
phases.content: Add Ctrl+/ keyboard shortcut handler in App.tsx to toggle the shortcuts panel. Add a ? button in the sidebar footer next to the settings gear. Add a 'Keyboard Shortcuts' action to the command palette via useCommandActions. Import and render KeyboardShortcuts component in App.tsx.
verification: ? button in sidebar footer opens the shortcuts panel
Command palette has a Keyboard Shortcuts action
